item.description: ~~~~ Welcome to the first edition of [open-iterations]! ~~~~ This is a new e-zine showcasing generative art and the code that made it. Most of these works were done in Processing and Quil, a Clojure wrapper for Processing. All of the code is included, so feel free to copy and remix anything you see here! If you're interested in contributing to this zine, send an email to:     openiterations -at- colindrake -dot- me
